basics.name: Jeff Takiguchi
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I'm a business and technology enthusiast from Hawaii. I believe in building meaningful relationships and finding fun, creative ways to add value to my work. I work in software development, system analysis & design, and user experience design.

highlights: Planned and facilitated the replacement of a 20 year old ERP system.
On the job learning of Microsoft Azure ecosystem and Dynamics.
Built cloud integration for synchronizing data between Dynamics and Route Planning software using Azure cloud.
Developed internal application for managing Logistics division using React and Power Platform APIs
Created reporting systems using Microsoft business intelligence tools and Dynamics OData APIs for 8 departments.
Facilitated the concept, design, and implementation of the ChefZone retail project
Built membership and shelf-tag systems to improve operational efficiency
Collaborated with company stakeholders to build business plans and strategy.
Work with client on legacy application to work with new business requirements.
Build AWS monitoring functionality into client's application to monitor credit card fraud.
Learned to Manage and debug clientâ€™s production environment in AWS.
Deployed custom microservices with AWS lambda to improve performance of Rails App.
Built out features of the SCF API using Ruby on Rails.
Integrated external localization API to reach international customers
Extended Rails API functionality for consumption by mobile application
Practiced TDD and code reviews in organized team workflow
Planned, Produced, and executed financial education for children in Hawaii
Worked with vendors and volunteers to organize a large event with over 500 attendees
